amendment.description: Page 7, line 14, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $1,000,000)". Page 7, line 23, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $3,000,000)". ***.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
